name: Deville HighSchool Demo
description:
Sam Morningstar is your typical High school student. He loves watching old movies, does sports, hangs out with his friends, has a part time job, he just also happens to be the crown prince of Hell... yes, THE Hell.
Enjoy this little preview of our devilishly delightful dark descent into the daily going-ons of our protagonist.

Also find attached a special present from us. A series of awesomely adorable artistry, specially selected for you.
